trans-unit.source: Viewing Replication Information

seg-source.mrk: Viewing Replication Information

target.mrk: Visualiser l’information sur la réplication

trans-unit.source: You can display replication information in the Agent view of the and in command mode.

seg-source.mrk: You can display replication information in the Agent view of the and in command mode.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez afficher les informations de réplication dans la vue Agent de l' et en mode commande.

trans-unit.source: To display replication information in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: To display replication information in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Afficher l’information de réplication dans la <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: In the , select    Agents.

seg-source.mrk: In the , select    Agents.

target.mrk: Dans la , sélectionnez Agents.

trans-unit.source: Click Columns to Display. Check the replication columns you want to display.

seg-source.mrk: Click Columns to Display.
Check the replication columns you want to display.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur le bouton Colonnes à afficher.
Cochez les colonnes concernant la réplication que vous voulez afficher.

trans-unit.source: This table describes the replication information available for each agent:

seg-source.mrk: This table describes the replication information available for each agent:

target.mrk: Ce tableau décrit les informations de réplication disponibles pour chaque agent :

trans-unit.source: Column

seg-source.mrk: Column

target.mrk: Paramètre

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Replication Source Name

seg-source.mrk: Replication Source Name

target.mrk: Nom de la source de réplication

trans-unit.source: Name of the server providing data for the specific agent. If the source is the agent (or if no replication is defined), this field is empty.

seg-source.mrk: Name of the server providing data for the specific agent.
If the source is the agent (or if no replication is defined), this field is empty.

target.mrk: Nom du serveur fournissant les données pour l'agent en question.
Si la source est l'agent (ou si aucune réplication n’est définie), ce champ est vide.

trans-unit.source: Replication Destination Name

seg-source.mrk: Replication Destination Name

target.mrk: Nom de la destination de réplication

trans-unit.source: Name of the server to which the current server is replicated. If you are viewing the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> from the replication destination server (or if no replication is defined), this field is empty.

seg-source.mrk: Name of the server to which the current server is replicated.

If you are viewing the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> from the replication destination server (or if no replication is defined), this field is empty.

target.mrk: Indique le nom du serveur sur lequel le serveur actuel est répliqué.

Si vous regardez l'<MadCap:variable name="HSS.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> depuis le serveur de destination de réplication ou si vous n'avez pas défini de réplication, ce champ est vide.

trans-unit.source: Last Synchronization Point Replicated

seg-source.mrk: Last Synchronization Point Replicated

target.mrk: Dernier point de synchronisation répliqué

trans-unit.source: Time of the last synchronization, i.e., last protection time of the replicated data.

seg-source.mrk: Time of the last synchronization, i.e., last protection time of the replicated data.

target.mrk: Heure de la dernière synchronisation, c’est-à-dire l’heure de la dernière protection des données répliquées.

trans-unit.source: Replication Lag

seg-source.mrk: Replication Lag

target.mrk: Décalage de réplication

trans-unit.source: Displays information regarding the replication of this agent. Synchronized means the agent has been correctly replicated to the target replication server.

seg-source.mrk: Displays information regarding the replication of this agent.
Synchronized means the agent has been correctly replicated to the target replication server.

target.mrk: Affiche l'information sur la réplication de l'agent.
Synchronisé signifie que l’agent a été correctement répliqué sur le serveur de réplication cible.

trans-unit.source: To display replication information in command line

seg-source.mrk: To display replication information in command line

target.mrk: Afficher les informations de réplication en mode ligne de commande

trans-unit.source: On the machine hosting the :

seg-source.mrk: On the machine hosting the :

target.mrk: Sur la machine hébergeant :

trans-unit.source: Windows.

seg-source.mrk: Windows.

target.mrk: Windows.

trans-unit.source: Select Start   Programs   Atempo-Deduplication Engine   Administration.

seg-source.mrk: Select Start   Programs   Atempo-Deduplication Engine   Administration.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Démarrer Programmes Atempo-Deduplication Engine Administration.

trans-unit.source: Linux.

seg-source.mrk: Linux.

target.mrk: Linux.

trans-unit.source: Launch the ./ade_admin command.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the ./ade_admin command.

target.mrk: Lancez la commande ./ade_admin.

trans-unit.source: Provide a password. Two default users exist in the :

seg-source.mrk: <span class="_Override">Provide a password.
Two default users exist in the :

target.mrk: <span class="_Override">Entrez un mot de passe.
Deux utilisateurs par défaut existent dans le :

trans-unit.source: admin, password admin (default user with administrative rights)

seg-source.mrk: admin, password admin (default user with administrative rights)

target.mrk: admin, mot de passe admin (utilisateur par défaut avec des droits administratifs)

trans-unit.source: tina, password tina (standard user)

seg-source.mrk: tina, password tina (standard user)

target.mrk: tina, mot de passe tina (utilisateur standard)

trans-unit.source: If you must launch the Command Line Interface with a different user, then run the ./ade_admin -u username command.

seg-source.mrk: If you must launch the Command Line Interface with a different user, then run the ./ade_admin -u username command.

target.mrk: Pour lancer le mode commande avec un utilisateur différent, exécutez la commande ./ade_admin -u username.

trans-unit.source: You are prompted to enter the password for this user.

seg-source.mrk: You are prompted to enter the password for this user.

target.mrk: Vous devez fournir le mot de passe de cet utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: Run the repli_info command to display this information:

seg-source.mrk: Run the repli_info command to display this information:

target.mrk: Exécutez la commande repli_info pour afficher ces informations :

trans-unit.source: The replication destination.

seg-source.mrk: The replication destination.

target.mrk: La destination de la réplication.

trans-unit.source: The replication status.

seg-source.mrk: The replication status.

target.mrk: L'état de la réplication.

trans-unit.source: The replication lag can be inferred from the last synchro point which is the date from which you are able to restore data from the replication target if the replication source is off. It is the difference between the current time and the last synchro point.

seg-source.mrk: The replication lag can be inferred from the last synchro point which is the date from which you are able to restore data from the replication target if the replication source is off.
It is the difference between the current time and the last synchro point.

target.mrk: Le décalage de réplication peut être déduit du dernier point de synchronisation qui est la date à partir de laquelle vous pouvez restaurer les données depuis la cible de réplication si la source est éteinte.
Il s’agit de la différence entre l'heure actuelle et le dernier point de synchronisation (last synchro point)..
